profile.name: Rocket.Chat
profile.about: Rocket.Chat is a company built on open source values and a love for efficiency. The company is driven by our amazing community of contributors.

summaries.content: Rocket.Chat server (https://github.com/RocketChat/Rocket.Chat) has a Prototype Pollution vulnerability that leads to RCE under the admin account. Any user can create their own server in your cloud and become an admin so this vulnerability could affect the cloud infrastructure. This attack vector also may increase the impact of XSS to RCE which is dangerous for self-hosted users as well.
